Menu Home Mobile Homes Champion/Scotbilt Homes Clayton Homes of Waycross Clayton Homes of Waycross Continued Pre Owned Homes Sheds Carports FInancing About us Contact Our Team Matthew R Stanton III Vice President
mattrs3@gmail.com ABOUT US Stanton Mobile Homes offers a variety of services including new and used mobile homes by Champion/Scotbilt, Palm Harbor, Champion/Homes of Merit and Clayton Homes of Waycross. We also offer Superior sheds. We buy and sell property, and offer land/home packages. BACKGROUND Stanton Mobile Homes, Inc. was founded in 1981 and has built an excellent reputation for doing business correctly. We now own and operate one sales location, three rental communities, and are affiliated with a number of support companies. Extremely competent crews handle all of our deliveries and set-ups. OUR MISSION Our mission at Stanton Homes is to provide quality homes at discount prices. Our professionalism and product knowledge allows us to provide the best quality homes at the lowest prices. We are committed to working just as hard before our customers make a financial commitment as we are after a financial commitment is made. We are committed to getting everyone in a home, no matter what your credit history is. Come in and talk to us and see what Stanton Homes can do to make your dreams of owning a home reality. Stanton Mobile Home Sales, Inc. now offers one sales location, three rental communities, and are affiliated with a number of support companies. We are offering comprehensive service throughout Florida. We also offer rent to own services. Maria Rudd Sales Specialist
mariarudd8106@gmail.com Jennifer Suggs Accounting Manager
stantonmobilehomes@gmail.com Shannon Garrett Collections
shannonsmh00@gmail.com Celene Carrillo Sales Assistant / Clerical
carrillocelene0@gmail.com Esmeralda Ortiz Shed and Carport Specialist
esmerortiz82@gmail.com Accomplishments/Awards Over the years we have been awarded numerous sales and service awards. We have received the Fleetwood Customer Satisfaction Award every year since its origination. In terms of meeting your unique needs, we can arrange to customize our products and services; as a rule we include the following: Delivery of your home anywhere in Florida We will Block, Level, and Anchor your home to State and Local codes Plumbing and Sewer Hook-ups to twenty feet Central Heating and Air Conditioning Skirting and Steps with handrails We can also help you with the following needs: Septic Tank Installation Well Systems Complete Electrical Connection Foundation For Home Concrete Work Aluminum Work You name it, We can handle it! Our Team Matthew R Stanton III Vice President
